title: !!SET UP HOME IN THIS WONDERFULLY SPACIOUS STUDIO IN SAN MATEO HILLS!!
map_address: 1555 W. Hillsdale Blvd. near Left @ Clearview Way
posting_body: ['Park View Terrace Apartments', '1555 W. Hillsdale Blvd', 'San Mateo, CA  94402', 'show contact info', '<URL>', 'PLEASE NOTE THAT THE PICTURES SHOWN ARE OF A SIMILAR UNIT.', '  THE ACTUAL UNIT HAS TREE & POOL VIEWS AND MORE NATURAL LIGHT.', 'SPACIOUS studio unit (approx.', '500 sq. ft.)', 'nestled in the desirable Laurelwood area of San Mateo.', ' The studio comes with crown molding, wood flooring, mirrored closet doors,  and a private balcony with dual-pane sliding glass door.', ' This unit has stainless steel appliances with built-in microwave, and also includes dishwasher and garbage disposal.', ' Please note that studio units are for one (1) individual only.', 'Immaculately maintained buildings and grounds with quiet, pleasant, and respectful neighbors.', 'Complex amenities include on-site management, maintenance personnel, secured buildings, laundry facilities, on-site parking, and newly remodeled swimming pool.', 'Our apartment community has a country feel and charm with the convenience of city life.', 'Easy access to Highway 92, 280, 101 and Sam Trans, and within walking distance to Laurelwood Shopping Center.', ' There is a Farmer’s Market every Saturday at College of San Mateo from 9am to 1pm, and Crystal Springs Shopping Center, Cal-Train Station and Hillsdale Mall are located within minutes of our complex.', 'Rent includes water, sewer, garbage and parking.', ' Security deposit is equal to one month’s rent.', ' There is a $40 non-refundable application fee per adult.', ' Sorry, no co-signers or guarantors.', ' Cats (1) are welcome!', ' Please note that we are a non-smoking property .', ' We invite you to contact the Park View Terrace management office at', 'show contact info', 'between 9am-5pm/Monday-Friday, and 9am-3pm/Saturdays, to tour the units and property.', ' After hours appointments are also available.', 'NOTE:  WEARING A MASK IS OPTIONAL.', ' ID IS REQUIRED FOR TOURING.', ' THANK YOU!']
